courses.title: Introduction to C#
courses.description: Learn Microsoft’s popular programming language C#, used to make websites, mobile apps, video games, VR, and more!

courses.title: Introduction to JavaScript
courses.description: Learn the JavaScript fundamentals you’ll need for front-end or back-end development.

courses.title: Introduction to CSS
courses.description: Learn how to style and visually organize HTML with CSS. This course covers version 3 of CSS.

courses.title: Introduction to HTML
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML5 and start building & editing web pages.

courses.title: Introduction to SQL
courses.description: Learn to communicate with databases using SQL, the standard data management language.

courses.title: Introduction to React
courses.description: Build powerful interactive applications with React, a popular JavaScript library.
